name: clwlkswks

body.origin:
|- wss(cfv(cclwlks, c0), cfv(cwlks, c0))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cclwlks, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cwlks, c0)))
-| diffsc(hs0, cfv(cclwlks, c0))
-| diffsc(hs0, cfv(cwlks, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (ClWalks ` c0)⊆(Walks ` c0)
⊣ (hs0 ∈(ClWalks ` c0)→ hs0 ∈(Walks ` c0))
⊣ d(hs0,(ClWalks ` c0))
⊣ d(hs0,(Walks ` c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cfv(cclwlks, c0), cfv(cwlks, c0))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cclwlks, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cwlks, c0)))
-| diffsc(hs0, cfv(cclwlks, c0))
-| diffsc(hs0, cfv(cwlks, c0))
cumulated.pretty:

⊣ d(hs0,(Walks ` c0))

comment: Closed walks are walks (in an undirected graph). (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-Aug-2018.) (Revised by AV, 16-Feb-2021.)
